thread.section_title: Larson Tax Relief Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Larson Tax Relief | www.larsontaxrelief.com
thread.title: Donald White
thread.title_full: Larson Tax Relief reviewed by Donald White

author: Donald White
title: Donald White
text: I hadn't filed in many years. Every time the door bell rang, I would wonder should I open the door or not. I finally opened the door to Larson financial. They took the pressure off me and went to work on my behalf. Could not have had a better experience. I was kept inform ed on every move. Not having much money at my disposal, they worked with me and as a team made it happen. Forgot to mention, saved $20,000 !!! Open the door and let the sunshine in.
